summary: ABOUT FIVE MONTHS AGO  ABS SYSTEM WENT OUT.   VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER ON 6/9/2003.   DEALER TOLD THE CONSUMER THAT ABS SYSTEM WAS UNDER WARRANTY.  TSTARTED TO WORK ON THE VEHICLE AND IT NEEDED MORE PARTS WHICH WERE NOT UNDER WARRANTY.  THE OWNER OF THE VEHICLE DECIDED TO TAKE THE VEHICLE WITHOUT GETTING THE OTHER PARTS.  WHILE DRIVING THE LOST ALL BRAKE POWER. *AK
